text: Wizard of the Saddle is a 1928 American silent western film directed by Frank Howard Clark and starring Buzz Barton, Milburn Morante and James Ford.Munden p.914 ==Cast== * Buzz Barton as Red Hepner * Milburn Morante as Hank Robbins * James Ford as Tom Ellis * Duane Thompson as Jenny Adams * Jim Welch as 'Pop' Adams * Bert Appling as Kirk McGrew ==References== ==Bibliography== * Munden, Kenneth White. The American Film Institute Catalog of Motion Pictures Produced in the United States, Part 1. University of California Press, 1997. ==External links== * Category:1928 films Category:1928 Western (genre) films Category:English-language films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American Western (genre) films Category:American black-and-white films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films
title: Wizard of the Saddle
